channel.title: How do you change the picture on a client?
channel.description: When i download clients. the client has a background picture. how do i change it??

item.title: How do you change the picture on a client?
item.dc:creator: @sharecode sharecode
item.description:
@sharecode wrote:

hey i did wat you said i got a new picture and replaced the name with the old one but when i open client run.bat thingy and client loads it doesnt show my picture only the old one.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the picture on a client?

item.title: How do you change the picture on a client?
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“jarnohhh, post:3, topic:228628”][quote author=public void mscpidiots() link=topic=300644.msg2413088#msg2413088 date=1220026868]
Didn’t you say you were a good coder? Looks like you’re not. Look in the client’s folder for an image, and make a new image with the name of the old image.
[/quote]

He can be a server coder… thats different of client coders IMO.[/quote]LOL… It’s the same if you are a “real” coder that actually knows java and doesn’t ask questions like this. If he really was a “coder” he wouldn’t ask stupid questions like this.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the picture on a client?

item.title: How do you change the picture on a client?
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

public void mscpidiots():

Didn’t you say you were a good coder? Looks like you’re not. Look in the client’s folder for an image, and make a new image with the name of the old image.

He can be a server coder… thats different of client coders IMO.

Read full topic
